channel.title: Updating server... Help
channel.description: When I edit my client code and when I want to update my server, whatever I have updated never comes up. I close compile file down then reload it and it is still the same as before. Help with this please? :confused:

item.title: Updating server... Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

this is my compiler (works with every java from update 6 to 10):

@echo off
COLOR F0
Title RS Starter's Kit Client Compiler
echo *******************************************************************************
echo *                         Compile Complete by Jakkie123                       *
echo *                                                                             *
echo *                     specially created for NOOBS!!!!!!!!!!!!!                *
echo *                                                                             *
echo *******************************************************************************
echo Checking Java version...
echo.

:checkjava
echo 06
if exist "C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_06/bin/javac.exe" goto java6
echo 07
if exist "C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_07/bin/javac.exe" goto java7
echo 08
if exist "C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_08/bin/javac.exe" goto java8
echo 09
if exist "C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_09/bin/javac.exe" goto java9
echo 10
if exist "C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_10/bin/javac.exe" goto java10

:java6
echo.
echo compiling...
echo java version: 1.5.0_06
echo.
"C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_06/bin/javac.exe" *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:java7
echo.
echo compiling...
echo java version: 1.5.0_07
echo.
"C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_07/bin/javac.exe" *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:java8
echo.
echo compiling...
echo java version: 1.5.0_08
echo.
"C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_08/bin/javac.exe" *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:java9
echo.
echo compiling...
echo java version: 1.5.0_09
echo.
"C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_09/bin/javac.exe" *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:java10
echo.
echo compiling...
echo java version: 1.5.0_10
echo.
"C:/program files/java/jdk1.5.0_10/bin/javac.exe" *.java -nowarn *.java
goto end

:end
echo.
echo Complete!
echo.
set recomp= 
set /p recomp= press enter to close
goto close

:close
echo.
echo closing compiler...

Read full topic

item.title: Updating server... Help
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

did you know that this

@echo off color 0a title Compiling... javac *.java pause
this code does very often causes problems that evryone is talking about like “how to fix that dam javac error” and so… i got like other do a better that sets where the file is

Read full topic

item.title: Updating server... Help
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:7, topic:30675”]edit your compiler erase everything replace it with this

@echo off color 0a title Compiling... javac *.java pause

then close save compile it run server log onto moparscape and your good.[/quote] if that doesnt work replace it with this @echo off COLOR 0F title SozScape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause make sure you have the latest version of jdk

Read full topic
